jserror.title: Unexpected error occurred
jserror.message: We have reported this to our team! Please close the app and start again!

errors.loginError: There was an error in the login, repeat the procedure.
errors.profileUpdateError: An error occurred while updating your profile.

inbox.enableCallToActionDescription: Enable the inbox to view messages

spid.selectIdp: To continue to login, select your SPID identity provider
spid.selectDemoIdp: If you do not have your own SPID identity yet, browse the app in demo mode

loginErrorAlert.title: Login error
loginErrorAlert.message: Sorry, there was an error while logging in, could you try again?

subscription.line1: SPID è l'identità digitale per accedere ai servizi online della Pubblica Amministrazione Italiana.
subscription.line2: Inserisci la tua e-mail per attivarla.

landing.nospid: Don't have SPID? Find out more

spid_information_request.paragraph1: SPID, the Public System of Digital Identity, allows you to access all the services of the Public Administration with a single Digital Identity (username and password).
spid_information_request.paragraph2: If you like, leave us your email address to receive reminders and updates on this app
spid_information_request.paragraph3: Continuing you declare to accept the
spid_information_request.tosLinkText: rules on the processing of personal data

tos.contentTitle: Terms of service and personal data
tos.section1: Terms and conditions of use of the service
tos.section2: Rules on the processing of personal data

pin.pinInfo: This code will be requested each time you open the app and when you need to view sensitive data or make dispositive transactions. It must be composed of 5 digits. Remember it carefully. You can change it at any time by entering with SPID.
pin.pinInfoSelected: This code will be requested each time you open the app and when you need to view sensitive data or make dispositive transactions.
pin.confirmInvalid: the two pins do not match

pin.pinForgot: I do not remember the pin

newPaymentMethod.addDescription: You can add your payment methods (e.g. credit cards, bank accounts) so that you don't have to re-add them from scratch for every transaction

textMsg.title: Text confirmation code
textMsg.info: Insert the code that was sent by text to your mobile phone

saveCard.title: Do you want to save this card?
saveCard.infoTitle: Set the card as favourite payment method
saveCard.info: This payment method will be automatically proposed for the next payment

addManager.title: Choose the manager
addManager.info: This card does not belong to the PagoPA payment network.
addManager.info2: which will have to manage yout payment.

ConfirmPayment.askConfirm: Want to proceed with the transaction?
ConfirmPayment.info: Warning: after this step it will not be possible to come back
ConfirmPayment.info2: You are using your favourite payment method.

payWith.title: Pay with
payWith.info: Choose one saved payment method or add a new one

firstTransactionSummary.title: Transaction notice
firstTransactionSummary.updateInfo: The pagoPa system updates automatically the amount to ensure you pay the exact amount and to avoid you arrears or additional interests

insertManually.title: Insert the notice data
insertManually.info: which allow us to identify the transaction

QRtoPay.cameraUsageInfo: Capture the QR Code on the payment notice with the camera, or manually insert the transaction-related data (IUV and the entity/company code).

saveCard.header: Do you whant to save this card?
saveCard.favoriteTitle: Set the cart as favourite payment method
saveCard.favoriteText: This payment method will be automatically proposed for the next payment

creditCardComponent.deleteMsg: This will delete the payment method

installation.errorMessage: Registration with the push notifications service generated an error

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.subtitle: This settings will be used by all services of the Public Amministration.
